Title: SPIE acquires Dutch cooling companies
Summary: FRANCE/GERMANY: SPIE, the French provider of multi-technical services in the areas of energy and communications, has acquired Dutch companies Voets & Donkers Koeltechniek BV and its subsidiary VND Technical Services BV.

Title: LG to supply cooling to $300m Jakarta data centre
Summary: INDONESIA: South Korean manufacturer LG has been named as the cooling solutions provider for a US$300m AI data centre currently under construction in Jakarta, Indonesia. …

Title: Death toll in Harlem LD outbreak rises to six
Summary: USA: The number of deaths in the legionnaires’ disease outbreak in New York City’s Harlem neighbourhood has risen to six.
